title: Pawn of Evil
description: Paul had left me a young and heartbroken widow. The strange disease that had claimed his mind—and then his life—was hard to forget. But I had to try. I was ready to begin again. Paul’s brother, Richard, steady and kind, was there to help me. Then Paul, Jr. appeared.I had never met this son of my husband’s first marriage, and now he was here, needing my help. Richard warned me not to see the boy, but I didn't listen.Then unnatural and terrifying things began to happen, and soon I was running from a macabre nightmare, from a sinister force that threatened to claim me. I was running from what I had hoped to love, a pawn of evil!
author: Audrey Leech
